Class Torus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shapes
      • ThreeDimensionalShapes
        • ThreeDCurves
          • Torus

  • public class Torus
extends ThreeDCurves
    Class for the Torus 3D shape. The class extends from ThreeDCurves as it shares multple variables and methods with the class.
    Author:
    Kyle Dorcey

    • Field Summary

      private double volume

    • Constructor Detail

      • Torus

        public Torus(java.lang.String shapeName,
             double minorRadius,
             double majorRadius)
        Torus class constructor. Passes shapeName and minorRadius to it's parent class. The volume and surface area are found from the setVolume() and setSurfaceArea() methods respectively.
        Parameters:
        shapeName - String containing user defined shape name
        minorRadius - double representation of the radius to the Torus's inner ring
        majorRadius - double representation of the radius to the Torus's outter ring

    • Method Detail

      • setSurfaceArea

        private static double setSurfaceArea(double minorRadius,
                                     double majorRadius)
        Finds the Torus's surface area. The method is static so it may be called during class construction
        Parameters:
        minorRadius - radius to Torus's inner ring
        majorRadius - radius to Torus's outer ring
        Returns:
        returns the surface area as a double

      • setVolume

        private static double setVolume(double majorRadius)
        Finds the volume of the Torus. The method is static so it may be called during class construction
        Parameters:
        majorRadius - radius to the Torus's outer ring
        Returns:
        returns volue as a double
